name: Burnout
text: Banish 1 face-up "Chemicritter" monster you control; Special Summon 2 "Chemicritter" monsters from your Deck, with different names from each other. When your opponent declares a direct attack, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 of your banished Gemini monsters; Special Summon it, and if you do, it becomes an Effect Monster and gains its effects. You can only activate 1 "Burnout" per turn.
